title: Simulation-Based Collaborative Learning for Enhanced Mathematical Problem-Solving Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts (functions, statistics, geometry, etc.) and ability to use digital devices
context.additional_context: Learners Must Be Familiar with Collaborative Activities in VR Environments and Utilize Personal Tablets or VR Equipment Under a BYOD Policy

learning_goals: Learners can solve complex mathematical problems with over 80% accuracy by applying collaborative learning strategies in a VR simulation environment
Learners can analyze group members' expertise using digital tools and develop role allocation plans
Learners can improve problem-solving solutions through at least two rounds of feedback exchange in 4-person group activities
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
